articles.author: Alyssa Fowers, Leslie Shapiro
articles.title: Who receives SNAP? Food aid for 1 in 8 Americans is threatened in November. - The Washington Post
articles.description: A look into the Americans who could be affected by the delay of SNAP food assistance during the government shutdown.
articles.content:
Forty-two million people roughly 1 in 8 Americans could see cuts or delays tofood assistance as soon as Saturday if the government shutdown continues.
The Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (… [+5435 chars]
